channel.title: How do i make myself admin on 508s?
channel.description:
How do i make myself Admin on 508 servers? Ive tried the login.java way by finding this [code]if (p.username.equals("[/code]
I have tried placing in my char file by the player rights 2. But everytime i log back in i will either be reset or still guest.
Anyone have any ideas?

item.title: How do i make myself admin on 508s?
item.dc:creator: @soul_banner soul_banner
item.description:
@soul_banner wrote:

^ wrong sometimes it does not work

@ login.java

ctrl + f search for
p.rights = 2;

you should see a username above that
or to be exact

            if (p.username.equals("test")) { //admin username here instead of test :)
                p.rights = 2;

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself admin on 508s?

item.title: How do i make myself admin on 508s?
item.dc:creator: @Your_Master Your Master
item.description:
@Your_Master wrote:

Easy dude. Open server files bin>data>charecters>mainsave, now find you name, open with wordpad. Then find that named:’‘Rights:0’'Make it look like Rights:2 Do not space after : Then save, be sure your logged out. If it wont work, then try other source.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make myself admin on 508s?
